resources.string: The \'Mobile Country Code\' is the code that indentifies the provider\'s country
This is the \'Mobile Network Code\' with these digits you can retrieve the provider\'s name
The \'Location Area Code\' identifies the area where the cell is located
The \'Cell Identity\' retrieves the ID of the cell
You are going to send the CGI and location to Securcube, by doing so you\'ll help us recognize cells around the world
Your authorization is necessary to get your CGI code and cell\'s position
Permission denied: the app won\'t work
